GenericResourceDao<T>, org.synyx.hades.dao.GenericDao<T,java.lang.Long>
public class GenericJpaResourceDao<T extends Resource>
extends GenericJpaDao<T,java.lang.Long>
implements GenericResourceDao<T>

JPA implementation of our Generic Dao that can manage Resource inherited classes.. Based on Hades Generic Dao.
